name: Colour Theory
description:
A 2D puzzle game made in Unity themed around colour theory.

One of the first games I made in Unity during my first year of uni. This is just a prototype, so while most of the core mechanics work,  the puzzles are very simple, and some things like doors opening only when the puzzle is completed have not been fully implemented. However, I'm quite proud of the concept, and the amount of work I put into the project then.
